name: Upgrade Dungeon
description:
You Fall Into A Mysterious Dungeon And Loose All Of You Abilities (Moving, Jumping, Collecting Powerups, Pausing The Game, Even Dying!). It Is Your Job To Get Back All Of Those Abilities (Yes, Even The Dying One, Otherwise There Will Be No Challenge. Sorry) And Climb Your Way Out Of The Dungeon In The Shortest Time Possible!

Like My Game "A Normal Game", This Is Based Off Of An Older Project Of Mine That I Created On An EDU Website Before Starting Unity, Which Was Inspired By A Game Literally Called "Nothing". I Will Not Link The EDU Game, However You Can Get The "Nothing" Game Here: https://joellikespigs.itch.io/ludum-dare-45-you-start-with-nothing

Also, Happy 2022 Everyone!

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Upgrade-Dungeon-Source
